title: Point and Click Ultimates
body:
Does anyone else hate point and click ults? Why is it that the easiest ults are point and click yet they do the most damage? I can dodge every {{champion:134}} ability in the book but her ult will still do massive damage. I can flash out of {{champion:45}} stun and dodge all of his abilities but the second he hits R he can ignite and i'm dead. 

I'm perfectly fine with escaping with 2 hp and seeing a {{champion:99}} later charging or even a {{champion:222}} rocket headed my way because if they kill me with it they earned it, but i don't see why a no counterplay ult is allowed, you can dodge the others but even if you use {{item:3157}} for {{champion:134}} and {{champion:45}} ult, odds are you were low and now you're in a bad spot

I find ults annoying like when i'm in a 1 v 1 and {{champion:10}} or {{champion:23}} ults, but at least it has counterplay, i can flash away or not fight them for 2 seconds but point and click ults doing the most damage out of any ultimate in the game is super frustrating and needs to be balanced in some way

replies.body: The counterplay is no moping around them with low health when their ult is up.
Who needs to bother with ultimates when some marksmen can hit for 1500 damage every second with a single right click?

well at least {{champion:134}}  has to set up her balls first
a  6 orb ulti is going to do twice as much as a 3 orb ulti... and it take a while to set up a 7 orb ulti (7 orb is the max).

{{champion:45}} .. just presses R

His Final Boss skin encapsulates the feeling nicely.

DELETE!!!
